text:
I am trying to do a load testing for TIBCO EMS middleware by publishing messages to the JMS queue using JMeter.The messages get published successfully to the queue.However I am unable to capture the response.I have added the correct Response queue name in the Subscriber as well as in the Properties(added a property called "JMSReplyTo" with value as the name of the Reply queue.
However the no response is received.When checked in the EMS server the messages do have null value for the "JMSReplyTo"string and hence not able to find the Response queue and timing out.
Request you to please suggest a solution for this as I am very new to Web Services testing.

Thanks and Regards,
Sutapa Sarkar
+31616173171
creator: sutapa_sarkar@infosys.com

text: Bugzilla is not a support forum, please ask first on User Mailing list giving as much details as possible.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
